word: Some have felt troubled because Brother and Sister _____ have each been drawing wages from the conference. But it is in harmony with the instruction that has often been given to me, that women who labor with their husbands in gospel work, should be paid for their services. Letter 48, 1907, p. 9. (To "The California Conference Committee, and the Brethren and Sisters in Berkeley and Oakland," February 1, 1907.)
